doc.title: God Take, God Give
doc.plot: The real life story of Vietnam War hero Staff Srgt John A Thorburn, After being shot down during a Government funded secret mission behind enemy lines, Thorburn was rescued spending 10 months in a full body cast and then shifted from soldier to family man. Giving birth to 6 children, all with strangely intense stories of their own. One child being insane celebrity rapper R.A. the Rugged Man, and Another child, his daughter Lisa married into the outlaw biker gang The Pagans. Due to Thorburn being exposed to Agent Orange during the war two of his other children were born severely handicapped: Dee-Dee couldn't walk or talk, and Maxx not only couldn't walk or talk but he was also born blind.
